songs.title: Tilt Ya Head Back
songs.lyrics:
[Nelly] + (C.A.)
Somebody gimme a bassline
Yeah, that's tight, check it
Drop the drums right here
Think we missin' somethin' (Mmmmmmmyeah)
Oh, I got it (Yeahhhhayyy)
Put some horns right here
Let's do it again
(Yea-yayy-yayy! Ha!)
(Uh-uhh-ohhh, awright!) Give her what she want
Give her what she want (woo! ha)
Give her want she want, gon' give her what she want

[Verse 1: Christina Aguilera]
I see you lookin, like what you see
Boy, now don't be shy
Ain't nothin but facin opportunity

[Nelly] + (C.A.)
She's right, you know (uhh, uhh)
She's right (yeah)
Man, she's right, you know (uhh, uhh)
She's right (OW!)
You stand there lookin at me and (at me)
I stand here lookin at you girl (at you, boy)
You know exactly what's on my mind, yeahhh

[Christina Aguilera] + (Nelly)
It's just the way that I see (to see)
You came here lookin for me (but, uhh, uhh)
But I don't do this type of thing all the time

Oh, you want me to

C'mere boy-oy-oyyy, I gotta little somethin for ya
Gotta little bit, can I get a little bit, yea yea
And I don't know
I don't know what it is but I just wanna get to know ya
Awright, awright, yeahhh

[Hook: Christina Aguilera] + (Nelly)
I need to daaaaaaaaaaaaance
(tilt ya head back)
(take it down now)
All night (bring it back up, slow-ly, fa' sho')
I need you to, daaaaaaaaaaaaance
(tilt ya head back) (take it down now)
All night (bring it back up, slow-ly, that's right)

[Nelly]
Now situations, girl, they often change - listen to me
Sometimes for the good (and) sometimes for the bad, but who's to blame

[C.A.] + (Nelly)
He's right you know (uhh, uhh)
He's right (OH! Baby girl)
He's right you know (uhh, uhh)
He's right, OW!!

[Nelly] + (C.A.)
You stand there lookin at me and (at me)
I stand here lookin at you girl (at you boy)
You know exactly what's on my mi-hiiiind, yeahhh

[Christina Aguilera] + (Nelly)
It's just the way that I see (to see)
You came here lookin for me (but, uhh, uhh)
But I don't do this type of thing all the ti-iiiiime
YEAHHHH-YEAHHHH

C'mere boy-oy-oyyy, I gotta little somethin for ya
Gotta little bit, can I get a little bit, yea yea
And I don't know-oww
I don't know, what it is, but I just wanna get to know ya
Awright, awright, yeahhh

[Hook: Christina Aguilera] + (Nelly)
I need to daaaaaaaaaaaaance (tilt ya head back) (take it down now)
All night (bring it back up, slow-ly, fa' sho')
I need you to, daaaaaaaaaaaaance (tilt ya head back) (take it down now)
All night (bring it back up, slow-ly, that's right)

[Nelly] Everybody just

[Christina Aguilera] + (Nelly)
Hustle for me, hustle (hustle)
Hustle for me, hustle (hustle)
Hustle for me, hustle (hustle)
Hustle for me, yeahhh

[Christina Aguilera]
AHHHHHHHHHHHH, you got some nerve!
Think you're so..
I got a little bit of that - that, little bit of this - this
Little bit of rap with a little bit of bitch yeah

[Nelly] + (C.A.)
You stand there lookin at me and (at me)
I stand here lookin at you girl (at you boy)
You know exactly what's on my mi-hiiiind, yeahhh

[Christina Aguilera] + (Nelly)
It's just the way that I see (to see)
You came here lookin for me (but, uhh, uhh)
But I don't do this type of thing all the ti-iiiiime

You want me to
C'mere boy-oy-oyyy, I gotta little somethin for ya
Gotta little bit, can I get a little bit, yea yea
And I don't know-oww
I don't know, what it is, but I just wanna get to know ya
Awright, awright, yeahhh

[Hook: Christina Aguilera] + (Nelly)
I need to daaaaaaaaaaaaance (tilt ya head back) (take it down now)
All night (bring it back up, slow-ly, fa' sho')
I need you to, daaaaaaaaaaaaance (tilt ya head back) (take it down now)
All night (bring it back up, slow-ly, that's right)

[Nelly] + (C.A.)
Give her what she want (hey) give her what she want (woo-woo-woo)
(oooh yea yeah) Give her what she want, 'gwan, give her what she want
(Oh Nelly) Give her what she want (Nelly Nelly) give her what she want
(You make me so sweaty baby, yeah, ye-yeah, ye-yeah)
Give her what she want, 'gwan, give her what she want
(Ye-yeah, ye-yeah, so!)
